solution_line_template: If Kevin has {kevin_counters} counters, and Reina has three, the number of counters Kevin has, Reina has {reina_counters_multiplier}*{kevin_counters} = <<{kevin_counters}*{reina_counters_multiplier}={reina_counters}>>{reina_counters} counters.

Reina also has four times the number of marbles that Kevin has, meaning he has {reina_marbles_multiplier}*{kevin_marbles} = <<{reina_marbles_multiplier}*{kevin_marbles}={reina_marbles}>>{reina_marbles} marbles.
